# Quran video generator

## Made with Remotion video and quranapi

# Demo

</p>

## Commands

**Install Dependencies**

```console
npm run install-quran
```

**Start Application**

```console
npm run quran
```

**Render Video from config.ts**

```console
npm run render
```
